items.name: Tara
items.description: A location-based social discovery mobile app that connects people through shared activities and experiences. The name 'Tara' means 'Let's go!' in Filipino, perfectly capturing the app's spirit of bringing people together.

items.name: QRollCall
items.description: A QR Attendance Tracking App built with Flutter. Allows users to scan QR codes and tracks attendance based on the scanned data.

items.name: Tuon
items.description: A modern web application built with Next.js and TypeScript.

items.name: BraTS Data Retriever
items.description: A Python utility for downloading Brain Tumor Segmentation (BraTS) datasets from Synapse platform using personal access tokens.

items.name: CARSU LaTeX Template
items.description: A modular LaTeX template for theses and capstone projects, designed for flexibility and ease of customization.
